mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT HORARIO.* FROM HORARIO, DIA, USUARIO WHERE DIA.IDHORARIO = HORARIO.ID AND USUARIO.ID = DIA.USUARIO AND USUARIO.restaurante = #{restaurante}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HORARIO(ACTIVO, MES, ANYO) VALUES(#{activo},#{mes},#{anyo});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM HORARIO WHERE MES = #{mes} AND ANYO = #{anyo}
